msg.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete?
msg.confirm_select: Selecting this element will make it visible to the students. The grades, if they already exist, will remain. Are you sure you want to select?
msg.confirm_unselect: Unselecting this element will make it inaccessible to students. The grades, if they already exist, will remain. Are you sure you want to unselect?

error.invalid_request: Invalid request error. Select a content type.
